name: Friday Night Funkin' Nerves Cover Mod
name_original: Friday Night Funkin' Nerves Cover Mod
description:
Friday Night Funkin' - but it's everyone sings Nerves Mod! :) Your favorite characters such as Agoti, Shaggy, Matt, Hex, Hank, Oswald, Ron, Majin Sonic (Fun is Infinite Sonic), and so much more are in this cover mod! 

This Mod is based off of the cover of my Everyone Sings Nerves! 

Credits do really go to Atsuover and Rageminner for making the original Nerves Song and Friday Night Funkin Smoke' Em Out Struggle mod! :)

Friday Night Funkin' Smoke 'Em Out Struggle Vs Garcello: https://gamebanana.com/mods/166531

NOTE: Play Nerves on NORMAL (NORMAL IS THE HARD CHARTING) 

Hope you enjoy listening and playing my cover and mod of Nerves! :)

Mod Used:

FNF Psych Engine Team: https://github.com/ShadowMario/FNF-PsychEngine
